name: Refactor for Test Coverage
description: Fix bugs AND achieve test coverage >= 80% by adding tests and making code testable
goal: Fix the calculator in calc.py to pass all existing tests, then add tests to achieve at least 80% code coverage. Requirements: (1) all tests pass, (2) coverage >= 80%. Run with 'python -m pytest test_calc.py --cov=calc --cov-report=json' and save results to artifacts/coverage.json.
